effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF
by focusing the mind.

Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF
by focusing the mind.

The user focuses
its mind to raise
the SP. ATK and
SP. DEF stats.

The user quietly
focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to
raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

The user quietly
focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to
raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

The user quietly
focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to
raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

Le lanceur se concentre et fait le vide
dans son esprit pour monter son
Attaque Spéciale et sa Défense Spéciale.

The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

しずかに　せいしんを　とういつし
こころを　しずめる　ことで　じぶんの
とくこうと　とくぼうを　あげる。

조용히 정신을 통일하고
마음을 가라앉혀서 자신의
특수공격과 특수방어를 올린다.

Le lanceur se concentre et fait le vide dans son
esprit pour augmenter son Attaque Spéciale et
sa Défense Spéciale.

Erhöht Spezial-Angriff und Spezial-Verteidigung
durch Konzentration.

Aumenta la concentración y calma el espíritu para
subir el Ataque Especial y la Defensa Especial.

Chi la usa, meditando, placa il proprio spirito per
aumentare l’Attacco Speciale e la Difesa Speciale.

The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

静かに　精神を　統一し
心を　鎮めることで　自分の
特攻と　特防を　あげる。

しずかに　せいしんを　とういつし
こころを　しずめる　ことで　じぶんの
とくこうと　とくぼうを　あげる。

조용히 정신을 통일하고
마음을 가라앉혀서 자신의
특수공격과 특수방어를 올린다.

Le lanceur se concentre et fait le vide dans son
esprit pour augmenter son Attaque Spéciale et
sa Défense Spéciale.

Erhöht Spezial-Angriff und Spezial-Verteidigung
durch Konzentration.

Aumenta la concentración y calma el espíritu para 
subir el Ataque Especial y la Defensa Especial.

Chi la usa, meditando, placa il proprio spirito per
aumentare l’Attacco Speciale e la Difesa Speciale.

The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

特攻と　特防を　あげる。

屏氣凝神，
提高自己的特攻和特防。
